

## git

### 1.git

githubgitgit(mac)

```shell
//

$ cd Desktop/myproject

//git

$ git init
```

#### 2.ssh key

githubssh key

```shell
$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"
```

**your_email@youremail.com******ssh keyssh key

#### 3.sshgithub

ssh keygithubssh keyssh keygithubmac

```shell 
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

ssh keygithubsettingSSH and GPG keysnew ssh keyssh key

```shell
$ git config --global user.email "your_email@youremail.com"
```

## ES2016

ES2016

1. `includes()``true``false`
2. `a ** b` `Math.pow(a, b)`

## ES2017

ES2017

1. Async  Promise 
2. `Object.values` `for...in``for...in`
3. `Object.entries()``for...in``for...in`
4. `Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors()``.value`,`.writable`,`.get`,`.set`,`.configurable`,`enumerable`
5. `padStart()``padEnd()`
6. 
7. `ShareArrayBuffer``Atomics`

ES2017 [What's New in ES2017](https://www.sitepoint.com/es2017-whats-new/)

## ES2018

ECMAScript 2018ES9 stage 4

### 

`async/await`

```js
async function process(array) {
  for (let i of array) {
    await doSomething(i);
  }
}
```



```js
async function process(array) {
  array.forEach(async i => {
    await doSomething(i);
  });
}
```



ES2018asynchronous iterators`next()`Promise`await``for...of`

```js
async function process(array) {
  for await (let i of array) {
    doSomething(i);
  }
}
```

### Promise.finally()

Promise`.then()``.catch()`Promise

`.finally()`

```js
function doSomething() {
  doSomething1()
  .then(doSomething2)
  .then(doSomething3)
  .catch(err => {
    console.log(err);
  })
  .finally(() => {
    // finish here!
  });
}
```

### Rest/Spread 

ES2015[Rest](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Functions/Rest_parameters)[](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Operators/Spread_syntax)...Rest

```js
restParam(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);

function restParam(p1, p2, ...p3) {
  // p1 = 1
  // p2 = 2
  // p3 = [3, 4, 5]
}
```

`Math.max()`

```js
const values = [99, 100, -1, 48, 16];
console.log( Math.max(...values) ); // 100
```

ES2018Rest

```js
const myObject = {
  a: 1,
  b: 2,
  c: 3
};

const { a, ...x } = myObject;
// a = 1
// x = { b: 2, c: 3 }
```



```js
restParam({
  a: 1,
  b: 2,
  c: 3
});

function restParam({ a, ...x }) {
  // a = 1
  // x = { b: 2, c: 3 }
}
```

Rest



```js
const obj1 = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 };
const obj2 = { ...obj1, z: 26 };
// obj2 is { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3, z: 26 }
```

`obj2 = {...obj1}` ****ABcloneBB

### Regular Expression Named Capture Groups

JavaScriptYYYY-MM-DD

```js
const
  reDate = /([0-9]{4})-([0-9]{2})-([0-9]{2})/,
  match  = reDate.exec('2018-04-30'),
  year   = match[1], // 2018
  month  = match[2], // 04
  day    = match[3]; // 30
```



ES2018`?<name>``(`

```js
const
  reDate = /(?<year>[0-9]{4})-(?<month>[0-9]{2})-(?<day>[0-9]{2})/,
  match  = reDate.exec('2018-04-30'),
  year   = match.groups.year,  // 2018
  month  = match.groups.month, // 04
  day    = match.groups.day;   // 30
```

`undefined`

`replace()` MM-DD-YYYY 

```js
const
  reDate = /(?<year>[0-9]{4})-(?<month>[0-9]{2})-(?<day>[0-9]{2})/,
  d      = '2018-04-30',
  usDate = d.replace(reDate, '$<month>-$<day>-$<year>');
```

### lookbehind

JavaScriptlookahead

```js
const
  reLookahead = /\D(?=\d+)/,
  match       = reLookahead.exec('$123.89');

console.log( match[0] ); // $
```

ES2018lookbehind

```js
const
  reLookbehind = /(?<=\D)\d+/,
  match        = reLookbehind.exec('$123.89');

console.log( match[0] ); // 123.89
```

 ****`\D` ****

```js
const
  reLookbehindNeg = /(?<!\D)\d+/,
  match           = reLookbehind.exec('$123.89');

console.log( match[0] ); // null
```

### `dotAll`

`.``s`

```js
/hello.world/.test('hello\nworld');  // false
/hello.world/s.test('hello\nworld'); // true
```

###  Unicode 

 Unicode ES2018 Unicode `\p{...}``\P{...}` `u` (unicode) `\p`

```js
const reGreekSymbol = /\p{Script=Greek}/u;
reGreekSymbol.test(''); // true
```

## git commit

```sh
npm install --save-dev @commitlint/cli husky
```

`commitlint.config.js`gitangular

```js
module.exports = {
  rules: {
    'body-leading-blank': [1, 'always'], //body
    'body-tense': [1, 'always', ['present-imperative']], 
    'footer-leading-blank': [1, 'always'], //footer
    'footer-tense': [1, 'always', ['present-imperative']],
    'header-max-length': [2, 'always', 72],
    'scope-case': [2, 'always', 'lowerCase'], //scope
    'subject-empty': [2, 'never'], //subject
    'subject-full-stop': [2, 'never', '.'], //subject'.'
    'subject-tense': [1, 'always', ['present-imperative']], //changechangedchanges
    'type-case': [2, 'always', 'lowerCase'], //type
    'type-empty': [2, 'never'], //type
    'type-enum': [
      2,
      'always',
      [
        'build',
        'chore',      //
        'docs',       //documentation
        'feat',       //feature
        'fix',        //bug
        'perf',
        'refactor',   //bug
        'revert',
        'style',      //
        'test',       //
      ],
    ], //type
  },
};
```

husky

```json
{
  "scripts": {
    "commitmsg": "commitlint -e"
  }
}
```

 Footer BREAKING CHANGE

```sh
    Before:

    scope: {
      myAttr: 'attribute',

    The removed `inject` wasn't generaly useful for directives so there should be no code using it.
```

```sh
while allowing our users to still keep the old semantics until they have fixed their
tests.

PR Close #19558
```

### 

```sh
# dependencies

# devDependencies
yarn add --dev webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server babel-core babel-loader babel-polyfill babel-preset-env babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-0 cross-env css-loader file-loader jsx-loader style-loader url-loader
```

****

1. webpack4cli(command line interface)webpack-cliCLI,webpack-cli[webpack-cli](https://doc.webpack-china.org/api/cli/)
2. BabelJavaScriptsyntaxAPIIteratorGeneratorSetMapsProxyReflectSymbolPromiseObject.assignbabel-polyfill

### webpack

buildwebpack.base.config.js, webpack.dev.config.js, webpack.production.config.jsdevproducitonbase

```js
// webpack.base.config.js
const path = require('path')

module.exports = {
  entry: {
    main: [
      'babel-polyfill',
      path.resolve(__dirname, '../src/main.js')
    ]
  },
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, '../dist'),
    publicPath: '/',
    filename: '[name].js',
    chunkFilename: 'chunk/[name].[chunkhash].js'
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader']
      },
      {
        test: /\.(js|jsx)$/,
        exclude: /(node_modules|bower_components)/,
        loader: 'babel-loader'
      },
      {
        test: /\.(png|jpg|gif|svg)$/,
        loader: 'url-loader',
        options: {
          limit: 10000,
          name: '[name].[ext]?[hash]'
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  resolve: {
    modules: ['node_modules'],
    extensions: ['.web.js', '.js', '.jsx', '.json']
  },
  mode: '' // webpack v4 add
}
```

webpackmodedevprodctuon

#### webpack4mode

webpack v4`mode``development``production`

1.

```js
//parent chunkchunk
optimization.removeAvailableModules:true
//chunks
optimization.removeEmptyChunks:true
//chunk
optimization.mergeDuplicateChunks:true
```

2.development

```js
//
devtool:eval
//, 
cache:true
//, 
module.unsafeCache:true
// bundle 
output.pathinfo:true
//,
optimization.providedExports:true
//chunk,chunk
optimization.splitChunks:true
// webpack chunk
optimization.runtimeChunk:true
//
optimization.noEmitOnErrors:true
//ids
optimization.namedModules:true
//chunkids
optimization.namedChunks:true
```

3.production

```js
//
performance:{hints:"error"....}
//chunkchunk,chunks
optimization.flagIncludedChunks:true
//ids
optimization.occurrenceOrder:true
//
optimization.usedExports:true
//package.json or rules sideEffects 
optimization.sideEffects:true
//- -
optimization.concatenateModules:true
//uglify-js
optimization.minimize:true
```

#### webpack.dev.config.js

```js
const webpack = require('webpack')
const config = require('./webpack.base.config.js')
const WebpackDevServer = require('webpack-dev-server')
const PORT = process.env.PORT || 8000 // 8000package.json

config.entry.main = (config.entry.main || []).concat([
  `webpack-dev-server/client?http://localhost:${PORT}/`,
  'webpack/hot/dev-server'
])

config.plugins = (config.plugins || []).concat([
  new webpack.HotModuleReplacementPlugin()
])

config.mode = 'development'

const compiler = webpack(config)

const server = new WebpackDevServer(compiler, {
  hot: true, // wbepack HMR
  quiet: true,
  historyApiFallback: true,
  filename: config.output.filename,
  publicPath: config.output.publicPath,
  stats: {
    colors: true
  }
})

server.listen(PORT, 'localhost', () => {
  console.log(`server started at localhost:${PORT}`)
})
```

`output.publicPath``devServer.publicPath`[WebpackpublicPath](https://juejin.im/post/5ae9ae5e518825672f19b094)

#### webpack.production.config.js

```js
const path = require('path')
const webpack = require('webpack')
const config = require('./webpack.base.config')
const CleanWebpackPlugin = require('clean-webpack-plugin')

config.mode = 'production'

config.plugins = (config.plugins || []).concat([
	new CleanWebpackPlugin(['dist'], {
    root: path.resolve(__dirname, '../')
  }),
  new webpack.HashedModuleIdsPlugin()
])

module.exports = config
```

```js
})
```
